title: Add additional articles and any required images to Articles pages

requirements.summary: Add the user-requested additional articles to the static Articles dataset so they appear on /articles and render correctly on /articles/$slug.
acceptanceCriteria: New article objects exist in frontend/src/data/articles.ts and follow the existing Article interface shape (slug, title, preview, content, image, date, author).
Each new article has a unique slug and does not break existing routes or article lookup by slug.
The /articles page renders cards for the newly added articles alongside existing ones.
Navigating to /articles/$slug for each newly added article shows the correct title, image, metadata, and full content without runtime errors.

file_operations.description: Append the additional user-requested article objects to the exported articles array, ensuring each includes slug/title/preview/content/author/date/image (English text only), uses unique slugs, and that image paths point to valid static assets.

requirements.summary: Ensure every newly added article references a valid static image asset and add any missing image files under frontend/public/assets (or frontend/public/assets/generated if generated).
acceptanceCriteria: For every newly added article, the Article.image field points to an existing static file path that loads successfully in the browser.
No broken image links appear on /articles or on any /articles/$slug page for the newly added articles.

file_operations.description: Add the new static image asset (from the provided workspace asset "WhatsApp Image 2026-01-17 at 9.45.54 AM.jpeg") under frontend/public/assets/ so it can be referenced by new Article.image fields.

Set/adjust the Article.image field for any newly added articles that require new images to reference the added static asset(s) under frontend/public/assets (or existing assets under frontend/public/assets/generated), ensuring no broken images on list/detail views.
